sentence.Network_en: You have to do a year's intensive training to become a paramedic.
sentence.Network_cn: 要接受一年的强化培训才能成为护理人员.

sentence.Network_en: We intend to have a paramedic on every ambulance within the next three years.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们计划在未来3年内为每辆救护车配备一名急救医士。

sentence.Network_en: A paramedic ambulance crew went to the accident scene but were unable to save Mrs Wilson.
sentence.Network_cn: 一组急救护理人员赶到事故现场，但没能救活威尔逊太太。

entry.tran: 急救医士；医务辅助人员
entry.def: A paramedic is a person whose training is similar to that of a nurse and who helps to do medical work.

example.ex: We intend to have a paramedic on every ambulance within the next three years.
example.tran: 我们计划在未来3年内为每辆救护车配备一名急救医士。

means.word_mean: 1. a person trained to assist medical professionals and to give emergency medical treatment

auth_sentence.content: Harris was a paramedic with Washington's fire department.
auth_sentence.res_content: Harris was a paramedic with Washington's fire department.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Harris was a paramedic with Washington's fire department.

auth_sentence.content: Closely followed by paramedic, prison officer and various forms of nursing.
auth_sentence.res_content: Closely followed by paramedic, prison officer and various forms of nursing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Closely followed by paramedic, prison officer and various forms of nursing.

auth_sentence.content: In a Virginia suburb, paramedic Denise Condetti says she loves lipstick.
auth_sentence.res_content: In a Virginia suburb, paramedic Denise Condetti says she loves lipstick.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In a Virginia suburb, paramedic Denise Condetti says she loves lipstick.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"半,类似,辅助"; 2. 表示"降落伞"; 3. 表示"在旁边"

stems_affixes.word_buile: para半,类似,辅助+all全部+el→全部都很类似→类似的→匹敌

stems_affixes.value_cn: 准军事性的,起军事辅助作用的
stems_affixes.word_buile: para半,类似,辅助+military军事的→准军事的
para半,类似,辅助+political政治的→adj.半政治的
para半,类似,辅助+state国+al的→adj.半官方的
para在旁边+bol抛+ic的→adj.抛物线[状]的
para在旁边+noid=note注意→在旁边注意→怀疑的
para半,类似,辅助+legal法律的→辅助法律的
para半,类似,辅助+medic医师,实习医生→n.护理人员
para半,类似,辅助+phrase措词→v.解释 n.解释
para降落伞+chut落下+e→n.降落伞
para降落伞+drop扔下→n.空投,空降

stems_affixes.value_cn: 伞兵部队, 空降部队
stems_affixes.word_buile: para降落伞+troop部队+s→n.伞兵部队, 空降部队
para在旁边+digm显示→在旁边显示给[别人]→示范
para在旁边+dox观点→观点边上有观点→矛盾
para在旁边+gon角→旁边顶尖人物→典范
para在旁边+log说话逻辑+ism现象,状态→在逻辑边上→不是逻辑
para旁边+sit坐+e→坐在在旁边[吃]→吃白食→寄生虫,食客
para半,类似,辅助+all全部+el→全部都很类似→类似的→匹敌
para半,类似,辅助+phrase措词→v.解释 n.解释

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使瘫痪[麻痹];使丧失作用
stems_affixes.word_buile: para在旁边+lyze分开→旁边分开→瘫痪

sentences.en: Paramedics are to have extra training in administering on-the-spot treatment.
sentences.cn: 急救员要接受现场护理的额外培训。

sentences.en: You have to do a year’s intensive training to become a paramedic.
sentences.cn: 要接受一年的强化培训才能成为护理人员。
